Archives of Irish America Vertical Files

Sheet Music and Lyrics [3 folders] Titles include: The Four Leaf Shamrock of Glenore, I've Got the Blues for the Wearing of the Green, My Wild Irish Rose, All That I Want is in Ireland, Rose of Kilkenny, Kathleen Mavourneen, Soldiers of Erin: The Rallying Song of the Irish Volunteers, The Irish Lads in Blue, I Dreamt that I Dwelt in Marble Halls
